Data Engineering is responsible for understanding, preparing, processing and analyzing data to make the data valuable and useful for operational and/or decision-making purposes. This is a unique position for someone with a passion for web app development and data.
Accountabilities
Uses knowledge of business objectives, strategies, and needs to identify opportunities where data can be leveraged to achieve the desired business benefits.

Title: Program Manager, Supply Chain Optimization
Job_Description:
What Program & Project Mgmt contributes to Cardinal Health
This position leads large projects focused on improving operations and processes across Cardinal’s Medical Segment supply chain. Periodic travel in support of project identification and implementation will be required.
